name: My Valentine - Visual Novel
description:
My Valentine is a visual novel created by Love2DrawManga. Suitable for all ages. 

You're hired as a temporary worker at Clear Star Café. You'll be working alongside Finnley and Samson. In the process will you find your valentine? 

- Two romance routes
- Namable Main Character
- Multiple endings. Bad, Good, and Perfect.
- Unlockable image gallery
- Alternate dialog and scenes. 
- 4000+ words

If you are having issues playing the game try using a different web browser or device.

If you would like to see my game creation process you can watch this video!
